name: apong (akillsers)
description:
Play against the computer or challenge your friends to a duel of reflexes. This is a completely free table tennis-like video game.

The first player to attain 7 points wins the game! After winning, you can continue into endless mode (singleplayer only), and see how many points you can get before the computer gets 7 points too.

Gameplay tip! The AI is more likely to miss the ball if you aim it at a sharp angle. You can control the angle of the ball by hitting it at different points of the paddle.
